amendment.description: To ensure states impacted by Hurricane Rita are treated equally with regard to cost-share adjustments for damage resulting from that hurricane.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3789 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3789 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S3859; text: CR S3859) To ensure states impacted by Hurricane Rita are treated equally with regard to cost-share adjustments for damage resulting from that hurricane.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3789 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3789 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Hutchison.
